about.subtitle: About
about.title: We Are ClickMaart
about.description: ClickMaart is Bangladesh's largest dropshipping and reselling platform. Without any kind of capital or investment, you can run an online business from home with products from numerous categories through us.

products.shoes_description: Stylish and comfortable shoes for everyday wear.
products.shoes_details: These premium shoes are crafted from the finest materials to provide both style and comfort. The cushioned insoles and breathable lining ensure all-day comfort.
products.oil_description: Pure and natural mustard oil for cooking and skincare.
products.oil_details: Cold-pressed from premium quality mustard seeds with no additives or preservatives. Perfect for both cooking and traditional skincare routines.
products.bag_description: Durable and stylish leather bag perfect for professionals.
products.bag_details: Handcrafted from genuine leather, this laptop bag features multiple compartments for your laptop, documents, and accessories. The padded strap ensures comfortable carrying.
products.running_shoes_details: Designed for runners who need responsive cushioning and breathability. The flexible sole provides excellent traction on various surfaces.
products.casual_shoes_details: Perfect for daily wear with cushioned footbed and flexible sole. The classic design matches any casual outfit.
products.coconut_oil_description: Virgin coconut oil for cooking and skincare.
products.coconut_oil_details: Extracted from fresh coconuts without chemical processing. Rich in nutrients and perfect for both culinary and beauty uses.
products.olive_oil_details: Imported from Mediterranean region with rich flavor and high nutritional value. Ideal for salads, cooking, and dressings.
products.backpack_details: Water-resistant material with padded straps for comfort. Multiple compartments help organize your belongings efficiently.
products.laptop_bag_details: Protects your laptop with cushioned compartments. Sleek design suitable for business professionals with dedicated pockets for accessories.

product.shipping_details: We offer fast and reliable shipping across Bangladesh with multiple delivery options:
product.shipping_option4: Express Delivery: Same day in Dhaka (৳150)
